description: The OR_CASE_SURG_RSC table contains OR management system case surgeons/staff/resources.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the lines of the surgical staff resource information in the case.

columns.name: RESOURCE_TYPE
columns.description: The specific type of the surgical resource within the case.

columns.name: IMPLANT_TRAY_ID
columns.description: Stores the implant tray associated with the pool.
